statements: DELETE FROM AudienceSegmentation WHERE demographic = 'Young Adults';
DELETE FROM AudienceSegmentation WHERE id = 1 AND demographic = 'Male'
DELETE FROM audience_segmentation WHERE segment_id = 10 AND segment_name = 'Tech Enthusiasts';
DELETE FROM demographics WHERE user_id = 100 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM interests WHERE user_id = 201 AND interest = 'Technology';
DELETE FROM campaign_targeting WHERE campaign_id = 1 AND user_id = 1001;
DELETE FROM interests WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM demographics WHERE location = 'New York');
